PHYS1301 Lecture 7: Collisions 2

18 Sep 2019

TODO

  • Still do homework?

Collisions

  • Elastic
    • Momentum and kinetic energy is preserved
    • Relative velocity is retained
    • Greater mmass → continues, equal mass → stops, lesser → bounce. Following $v_{f1}=\dfrac{m_1-m_2}{m_1+m_2}v_i = 1\text{ and } v_{f2}=\dfrac{2m_1}{m_2+m_2}v_i$
    • Solve with P conservation, K conservation
  • Inelastic
    • Momentum conserved
    • Solve from loss of internal energy or kinematics
